summary: Query user order list for specific App on Service Market
description: Query user order list for specific App on Service Market

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/service/market/order/query')
request.add_api_parameter("endCreated", "2000-01-01 00:00:00")
request.add_api_parameter("bizType", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("bizOrderId", "123123")
request.add_api_parameter("orderId", "1451231241")
request.add_api_parameter("pageNo", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("itemCode", "ts-1234-1")
request.add_api_parameter("pageSize", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("startCreated", "2000-01-01 00:00:00")
request.add_api_parameter("articleCode", "ts-1234")
request.add_api_parameter("shortCode", "TH123124")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/service/market/order/query')
request.add_api_param('endCreated', '2000-01-01 00:00:00')
request.add_api_param('bizType', '1')
request.add_api_param('bizOrderId', '123123')
request.add_api_param('orderId', '1451231241')
request.add_api_param('pageNo', '1')
request.add_api_param('itemCode', 'ts-1234-1')
request.add_api_param('pageSize', '10')
request.add_api_param('startCreated', '2000-01-01 00:00:00')
request.add_api_param('articleCode', 'ts-1234')
request.add_api_param('shortCode', 'TH123124')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
